DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the prevalence of pre-diabetes and diabetes among those Air Force personnel who have not passed the Air Force physical fitness test (AFPT) and to evaluate the usefulness of the AFPT as a prescreening tool for these disease processes.
DOC.brief_title: A1c FIT TEST: An Epidemiological Study Correlating Hemoglobin A1c With Results of the Air Force Physical FITness TEST.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: Tricare Insurance Beneficiary (military insurance) receiving care at Nellis AFB Over the age of 18 and took their AFPT within the past 1 month. Exclusion: Previous diagnosis of diabetes Pregnant or nursing
